subject: EU Delivery fees
description_text:
Hello, I have an interest in purchasing Plus X pedals and wanted some info
on delivery and import fees. Where do you ship the items from as I'm
located in Bulgaria, so if they're shipped from the EU, the fees would be
less. And what would be the delivery cost? Thank you!

conversations.body_text: Hello, all products except the Pro X Ultra baseplate are in stock at our German warehouse, so there's no need to worryâ€”there are no additional fees.
